title: Possible causes of failing to send / receive MMS, and the solution:
answer:
Common saying: The network status or signal is bad, resulting in the failure to send MMS. 

 Solution: Try again later. 

 1. Being rejected on the network side (MMS Center) will lead to the failure of MMS sending. 

 Common saying: MMS cannot be sent due to busy network or other causes, causing the failure to send. 

 Solution: Try again later. 

 2. Being rejected on the network side (MMS Center) will lead to the failure of MMS sending. 

 Common saying 1: The recipient's number is incorrect, resulting in transmission failure. 

 Solution 1: Check whether the recipient number is correct. If wrong, please correct it before sending the MMS again. 

 Common saying 2: The edited MMS is over 300KB in size, causing the failure to send. 

 Solution 2: Delete some MMS content so that the MMS is smaller than 300KB in size, and then try it again. 

 3. Arrears. 

 Common saying: It is arrears that cause the failure to transmit. 

 Solution: Try it again after payment. 

 4. Insufficient memory will cause the failure to receive MMSs 

 Common saying: Insufficient phone memory. 

 Solution: Free the phoneâ€™s memory so that the remaining space is greater than 300K
